short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a gray background to the webayudar Frontpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Gray Background" add-on for Webayudar provides users with an enhanced visual experience during browsing. This extension modifies the background of Webayudar's Frontpage by applying an even coat of gray, resulting in a sleek and uniform interface. The consistent gray background eliminates any design inconsistencies or distractions, allowing users to focus on the website's content.

Using the extension is straightforward and requires no configuration. Once installed, the add-on automatically changes the background to gray whenever the website is accessed. The extension does not track or transmit personal data or information and does not impact other website functions.

Overall, the "Gray Canvas" add-on is a simple yet effective way to improve the browsing experience on Webayudar. The consistent gray background provides a clean, visually appealing interface. With its streamlined design, this extension is ideal for users seeking a seamless, distraction-free browsing experience.
